diff_hunk:
@@ -115,7 +115,7 @@
 from tools.setup_helpers.generate_code import generate_code
 from tools.setup_helpers.ninja_builder import NinjaBuilder, ninja_build_ext
 from tools.setup_helpers.dist_check import WITH_DISTRIBUTED, \
-    WITH_DISTRIBUTED_MW, WITH_GLOO_IBVERBS
+    WITH_DISTRIBUTED_MW, WITH_GLOO_IBVERBS, WITH_C10D
body: WITH_DISTRIBUTED is still OK on Windows and without CUDA. Using a separate flag avoids conflating the existing meaning with the subset of environments that c10d will build in.
body_html: WITH_DISTRIBUTED is still OK on Windows and without CUDA. Using a separate flag avoids conflating the existing meaning with the subset of environments that c10d will build in.
body_text: WITH_DISTRIBUTED is still OK on Windows and without CUDA. Using a separate flag avoids conflating the existing meaning with the subset of environments that c10d will build in.
